feed.title: Joplin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Joplin: v3.2.12
entry.content:
• Improved: Allow internal links to target elements using the name attribute (#11671 by @personalizedrefrigerator)
  • Fixed: Fix error when a note has no history (#11702 by @personalizedrefrigerator)
  • Security: Improve comment escaping (#11706 by @personalizedrefrigerator)

entry.title: New release for Joplin: v3.2.13
entry.content:
• Improved: Plugins: Mark the LanguageTool Integration plugin as incompatible (#11715) (#11710 by @personalizedrefrigerator)
  • Fixed: Preserve attachment file extensions regardless of the mime type (#11852) (#11759 by @pedr)

entry.title: New release for Joplin: v3.3.9
entry.content: • Fixed: Fix inserting note links using the mouse (#12199) (#12197 by @personalizedrefrigerator)

entry.title: New release for Joplin: v3.3.10
entry.content: • Fixed: Notify user when they are using the Intel app on Apple Silicon (#11989)

entry.title: New release for Joplin: v3.3.12
entry.content:
• Improved: Plugins: Undeprecate joplin.settings.value() (3f364a4)
  • Fixed: Fix crash after removing "toggle tab indentation" keyboard shortcut (#12213) (#12204 by @personalizedrefrigerator)
  • Fixed: Fix printing (#12219 by @personalizedrefrigerator)
  • Fixed: Prevent application from hanging when multi-instance setup does not work (#12222)
